Welcome to my homepage.

Currently, I am preparing applications of Ph.D. programs in Computer Science, specialized in machine learning. I obtained my MSc. in Electrical Engineering from University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) in March 2017. During July 2016 to March 2017, I worked as a research associate in MR(Magnetic Resonance) Engineering Laboratory (Han Laboratory), affiliated with Biomedical Imaging Research Institute (BIRI) at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, Los Angeles.

You can find the details of my background and selected projects in my CV.
